title.rendered: Katie Price Releases the First Glimpse of Her Raunchy OnlyFans Photos After Announcing She’s Joined to Make Millions

content.rendered:
January 26, 2022

Katie Price Releases the First Glimpse of Her Raunchy OnlyFans Photos After Announcing She’s Joined to Make Millions

On Wednesday afternoon, the former glamour model announced to her fans that she would be posting X-rated content on the subscriber-only site.

Katie, 43, announced she had set up an OnlyFans page for her “devotee fans” to follow “intimate” details of her life.

With a video on Instagram, the mother-of-five debuted the site, which will show behind-the-scenes footage of glamour shoots.

In the clips, the media personality poses scantily clad on various pieces of furniture around her home, posing in different underwear looks.

As Katie lies backwards over the edge of her sofa in one shot, she is seen wearing black lace, while in another, she is wearing a latex bodysuit.

Katie wears a tiny bikini and a baseball cap printed with the OnlyFans logo, sexy white lingerie and matching long stockings in another teaser.

Moreover, she’ll wear an all-pink outfit with a furry cardigan to conceal the saucy underwear underneath and a gem-covered pink crown.

Another clip shows her sitting behind the wheel of a stationary car while wearing a pink t-shirt and giving fans a sultry smile.

At a monthly subscription price of $14.99 (£11.10), it already appears the site offers several exclusive images and videos to fans.

In a teaser video, Katie captioned: “I can’t wait to get to know my most loyal fans on OnlyFans and will publish content that is exclusive to OnlyFans.

There will undoubtedly be glamourous pictures since this is where it all began for me.

In addition, she explained that the site was a place where she could discuss “what’s REALLY going on in her life” and share “exclusive images”.

According to the star, she wants to take back control of her content and images. Her new OnlyFans channel will give her more confidence to share more intimate footage and pictures without worrying about society’s trolls.

“I hope this will inspire a lot more women of all ages, sizes, and backgrounds to feel positive and empowered.”

“THE RULES ARE MINE”

The bankrupt mum-of-five, 43, was revealed last year that she was planning to join the site, and she has confirmed the racy decision – claiming “it’s my body, my rules.”

At a press conference today, Katie explained as a nun: “The reason I’m wearing a nun outfit is that I’m pure, and I’m innocent. New year, new me.

I’ve been doing glamour for years. I’m so excited to do my OnlyFans channel. It’s something I was born to do.

“There are no lads magazines anymore, and I’m not doing it for free. I was paid to do what I do. Why would you want to give that away? My body has value, I want to control how I display it.”

“I embrace myself – I’m a feminist,” said Katie, who was joined by her serious-looking fiance Carl Woods.

I can’t wait to see all the good things because I have my babies to look forward to. This platform’s more than just pictures. I’m just so excited.”

The show is an insight into my life – like a reality show. “I thought it was all about nudes and porn, that kind of thing.” “I wasn’t expecting that kind of stuff.” Certainly not what I will be doing.”

Fan teasing

In the weeks leading up to tonight’s episode of Mucky Mansion, Katie has been teasing fans with a big announcement.

Her close friend Kerry Katona, who has made millions from stripping off on adult-only websites, will be following in her footsteps.

Her ex-husband Kieran Hayler actress Sarah Jayne Dunn and model Lottie Moss are among the app’s famous users.

We first reported that Katie considered joining the app to share intimate content in 2020.

“Katie plans to join OnlyFans to make money – she wouldn’t strip off, it would be more about glam fashion shoots and giving fans exclusive access to her life,” a source told us last year.

“Kerry Katona makes tons of money with OnlyFans – Katie wants the same.”

After dropping a series of hints over the last few weeks, fans were sure she was pregnant with her sixth child.

In an Instagram video, the TV star said, “Good morning, everyone. About four hours from now, I will make a big announcement.”

Money problems

Katie may face up to five years in prison following allegations she sent her ex-boyfriend Kieran Hayler a text message that potentially violated a court order.

In a court showdown averted on Monday, she paid more than £7k in court fines.

The fines she had not been paying since 2019 cost her £7,358.

For failing to pay the fines, the star faced a possible prison term but paid them back in full at the last minute.

We reported last August that she was declared bankrupt in November, and if she misses her next hearing, she could end up in prison.

After Katie took out an individual voluntary arrangement (IVA) in 2019, she was supposed to pay off £12,000 a month to her creditors, but she failed to do so.

The next hearing reviews her attempts to pay back her hefty debts to creditors two years after filing for bankruptcy.

Katie owes creditors £3.2 million but is unlikely to repay it all.

After the breakup of her third marriage to Kieran Hayler and the collapse of her businesses, the reality star’s once-lucrative £45million media empire crumbled.
